envRaster 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Create dataframe of 'cells' and their associated env data

Source: R/make_env.R
make_env.Rd

Multicore raster::extract() adapted from the Stack Exchange Network post by thiagoveloso.

make_env(x, df, cores = 1, out_file = tempfile(), limit = TRUE)

Arguments

x

Raster* object.
df

Dataframe. Must have a column called 'cell' that corresponds to the cell numbers in x.
cores

Numeric. Number of cores to use in snowfall::sfInit().
out_file

Character. Path to save outputs.
limit

Logical. If TRUE, only cells in df will be returned. Can be useful if cells already in out_file have been orphaned.

Value

Dataframe with column cell plus columns equal to the length of x.

Details

This function has been surpassed by get_env_data which uses terra::extract.

Contents
